formattedAddress: 571 Academy St, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 571 Academy St, New York, NY 10034-5104, USA

originalText.text: I do not recommend this medical practice for people with disabilities. It is not wheelchair accessible like they had claimed it was. First, The rooms and waiting area are close quarters. Second, all the clients are cramped up in a waiting area. Third, it is very crowded. Forth, it has steep ramp for walkers and wheelchair. Making it difficult to go in and out of the office.. Last but not least, you have to go through two close doors before you get to the waiting area. The wait is very long. I truly do not recommend this medical office.

originalText.text: Genuinely the worst doctor’s office I’ve ever experienced. The staff is incredibly rude and dismissive; I’ve been snapped at, hung up on, blown off, etc. I would only go here as a last resort, but even then, you’d probably find a Google search more helpful than anyone at Academy Medical Care.

text.text: Genuinely the worst doctor’s office I’ve ever experienced. The staff is incredibly rude and dismissive; I’ve been snapped at, hung up on, blown off, etc. I would only go here as a last resort, but even then, you’d probably find a Google search more helpful than anyone at Academy Medical Care.

originalText.text: I have been going to this office for over a year now. They are very attentive. Although they take many patient, and there is a bit of a wait like many other offices I do feel that they do a good job. the doctors genuinely take their time to hear all of my needs and they take action quickly with my health problems. The staff is extremely helpful and informative, they have helped me with even more than my health needs.

originalText.text: Worse place. Poor costumer service. Make you wait for hours to say that you are not in the system. Mind you that the day before they called to confirm appointment.

text.text: Worse place. Poor costumer service. Make you wait for hours to say that you are not in the system. Mind you that the day before they called to confirm appointment.

originalText.text: My personal doctor is nice but this clinic is very unorganized. Even when you have an appointment you have to wait for at least an hour to be seen. I was called to come in for labs and i have been waiting outside for over an hour and half. This is my third time coming here and every time it’s the same thing. Waiting for more than an hour for something so simple. For this reason i will be looking for another primary doctor.
